articles.title: England clinch T20 World Cup semi-final spot and knock defending champions Australia OUT - Daily Mail
articles.description: PAUL NEWMAN AT THE SCG: Ben Stokes stood firm when England most needed him yesterday to guide them into the Twenty20 World Cup semi-finals and knock Australia out.
articles.content:
Ben Stokes stood firm yesterday just as all around him were losing their nerve and England were flirting with Twenty20 World Cup disaster.
